basics.name: Andréa Gutierrez
basics.label: And
basics.summary: I am a software developer with experience developing and testing applications on the node. J's, j2ee and c + +. I love coding in dynamic programming languages like javascript. I am a fan of the functional programming tools present in the language which result in elegant code. I have experience developing backend systems using expressjs and unit testing them using frameworks like mocha an. I am also familiar with j2ee frameworks like spring.

references.reference: I worked with Andréa for more than 5 years and is a great enthusiastic & approachable leader. His mastery on API design and documentation, has been critical in launching many successfully appears in many designs.
references.name: Nguyen Quoc

references.reference: Andréa knows every latest technologies and information and collaborates with others very well.
